title: Wings of Fire
description:
By night, the winged warrior Antony Medichi fights the death vampires who threaten his world. By day, he hunts the rogue vampires who invade Mortal Earth. But deep in his heart rages the fiercest battle of allâ€”his soul-searing passion for the one mortal he is sworn to protectâ€¦the one woman he is doomed to love.
Parisa Lovejoy is so beautiful, and so powerful, that Antony cannot fight the feelings she arouses. But his unexpected love only intensifies his strength as her Guardianâ€”a strength that is put to the ultimate test when Parisa is abducted. Her captor, Commander Greaves, enslaves mortal women for their blood. If Parisa hopes to surviveâ€”and ascendâ€”she must forge an even deeper bond with Antonyâ€¦in the flames of eternity.
author: Caris Roane
